article_title: Holders of $10 Billion of Ukraine Debt Work on Restructuring Plan
article_text:
Investors holding $10 billion of Ukrainian debt have joined forces to develop a restructuring plan for the country’s debt that won’t involve a reduction in the principal value of the bonds, according to financial and legal advisers of the group.

“A detailed proposal is being developed by the committee that provides Ukraine with the necessary financial liquidity support it has requested… without any principal debt reductions,”...
